metadata.title: CVE-2017-0310 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
All versions of NVIDIA GPU Display Driver contain a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer handler where improper access controls allowingunprivileged user to cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcuda1-304 - 304.135-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
libcuda1-304-updates - 304.135-0ubuntu0.14.04.1

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-173: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
